subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: By the end of a night in which they were blown out by the Bulls, the Nets had traded Andrei Kirilenko to the 76ers, according to a person with knowledge of the deal.
snippet: By the end of a night in which they were blown out by the Bulls, the Nets had traded Andrei Kirilenko to the 76ers, according to a person with knowledge of the deal.
